Pre-Game Insights: Thomas Partey, Joseph Paintsil, Kingsley Schindler, and Osman Ibrahim are ruled out for Ghana.
Sudan has no injury worries and brought the full complement of their squad.
Ghana is third in Group F with one point from two games, while Sudan is second with three points.
Otto Addo’s record as Ghana coach shows two wins, two losses, and two draws in six matches.
Sudan’s assistant coach had a heated exchange with a Ghanaian journalist named Atta Poku.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Black Stars have scored ten goals in Otto Addo’s second stint and conceded.
Seifi Tieri is the key player for Sudan and will be a headache for the Ghanaian defense.
Mohammed Kudus is still Ghana’s best player despite his 2024/2025 season not going as expected.
